column15: Buy original Arrow Blue Round Neck T-shirt at best price in India. Read its features  reviews and specifications. Get fast & assured delivery all over India.
column17:
Arrow Blue Round Neck T-Shirt:
Brought to you by the renowned brand of Arrow this blue T-shirt for men is stylish yet comfortable to wear. This blue coloured round neck T-shirt is made from 100% cotton fabric which is ideal for you in the summer season. Complete your casual look with this half-sleeved T-shirt which has stylish print on the front. Pair up this blue T-shirt with a pair of dark blue or black denims to enhance your overall appeal while going for an outing or to casual parties.
